what: Create an interactive KPI widget for Quarto dashboards with Crosstalk support. — kpiwidget
title: Create an interactive KPI widget for Quarto dashboards with Crosstalk support. — kpiwidget
text: function computes displays key performance indicator (KPI) based variety statistics. data can filtered using logical vectors formulas. addition, comparison mode can applied specifying comparison parameter either "ratio" "share". example, comparison = "ratio" kpi = "sum" (column indicating sales), widget calculate ratio sales two groups defined group1 group2.

title: Create an interactive KPI widget for Quarto dashboards with Crosstalk support. — kpiwidget
code: kpiwidget(   data,   kpi = c("count", "distinctCount", "duplicates", "sum", "mean", "min", "max"),   comparison = NULL,   column = NULL,   selection = NULL,   group1 = NULL,   group2 = NULL,   decimals = 1,   big_mark = " ",   prefix = NULL,   suffix = NULL,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   elementId = NULL,   group = NULL )

title: Create an interactive KPI widget for Quarto dashboards with Crosstalk support. — kpiwidget
text: data crosstalk::SharedData object. kpi character string specifying metric compute. Options : "sum", "mean", "min", "max", "count", "distinctCount", "duplicates". default first element. comparison Optional. character string indicating comparison mode. Options "ratio" "share". provided (NULL), comparison performed. column column name (string) used numeric aggregation. standard mode required. comparison mode, provided used groups; omitted, counts used. selection one-sided formula filter rows. group1 comparison mode: one-sided formula defining group 1. required comparison mode. group2 comparison mode: one-sided formula defining group 2. comparison = "ratio", provided, defaults complement group1. comparison = "share", provided, defaults rows. decimals Number decimals round computed result. Default: 1. big_mark Character used thousands separator. Default: " ". prefix string prepended displayed value. suffix string appended displayed value. width Widget width (passed htmlwidgets::createWidget). height Widget height. elementId Optional element ID widget. group Crosstalk group name. Typically provided SharedData object.

title: Create an interactive KPI widget for Quarto dashboards with Crosstalk support. — kpiwidget
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{   # Standard KPI example:   kpiwidget(mtcars_shared, kpi = "mean", column = "mpg", decimals = 1,             prefix = "", suffix = " mpg")    # Comparison (ratio) example: ratio of sales between two regions.   kpiWidget(sales_shared, kpi = "sum", comparison = "ratio", column = "sales",             group1 = ~ region == "North",             # group2 is optional; defaults to complement of group1:             prefix = "$")    # Comparison (share) example: share of new customer sales relative to all sales.   kpiWidget(customer_shared, kpi = "sum", comparison = "share", column = "sales",             selection = ~ country == "USA",             group1 = ~ new_customer == TRUE,             # group2 is optional; defaults to all rows:             prefix = "", suffix = " %") } # }
